verses.verse: And Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
No <S%H551><s%> doubt <S%H551><s%> but you are the people, <S%H5971><s%> and wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with you.

But I have understanding <S%H3824><s%> as well <S%H1571><s%> as you; I am <S%H1961><s%> not inferior <S%H5307><s%> to you: yes, who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H854><s%> not such <S%H3644><s%> things as these? <S%H428><s%>

I am as one mocked <S%H7832><s%> of his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> who calls <S%H7121><s%> on God, <S%H433><s%> and he answers <S%H6030><s%> him: the just <S%H6662><s%> upright <S%H8549><s%> man is laughed <S%H7832><s%> to scorn.
He that is ready <S%H3559><s%> to slip <S%H4571><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%> is as a lamp <S%H3940><s%> despised <S%H937><s%> in the thought <S%H6248><s%> of him that is at ease. <S%H7600><s%>

The tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of robbers <S%H7703><s%> prosper, <S%H7951><s%> and they that provoke <S%H7264><s%> God <S%H410><s%> are secure; <S%H987><s%> into whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> God <S%H433><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> abundantly.
But ask <S%H7592><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the beasts, <S%H929><s%> and they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> you; and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and they shall tell <S%H5046><s%> you:
Or <S%H176><s%> speak <S%H7878><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it shall teach <S%H3384><s%> you: and the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall declare <S%H5608><s%> to you.
Who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> not in all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> that the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has worked <S%H6213><s%> this? <S%H2063><s%>

In whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> is the soul <S%H5315><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing, and the breath <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> mankind. <S%H1320><s%> <S%H376><s%>
Does not the ear <S%H241><s%> try <S%H974><s%> words? <S%H4405><s%> and the mouth <S%H2441><s%> taste <S%H2938><s%> his meat? <S%H400><s%>
With the ancient <S%H3453><s%> is wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> and in length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
With him is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and strength, <S%H1369><s%> he has counsel <S%H6098><s%> and understanding. <S%H8394><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he breaks <S%H2040><s%> down, <S%H2040><s%> and it cannot <S%H3808><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> again: he shuts <S%H5462><s%> up a man, <S%H376><s%> and there can be no <S%H3808><s%> opening. <S%H6605><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he withholds <S%H6113><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and they dry <S%H3001><s%> up: also he sends <S%H7971><s%> them out, and they overturn <S%H2015><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
With him is strength <S%H5797><s%> and wisdom: <S%H8454><s%> the deceived <S%H7683><s%> and the deceiver <S%H7686><s%> are his.
He leads <S%H3212><s%> counsellors <S%H3289><s%> away spoiled, <S%H7758><s%> and makes the judges <S%H8199><s%> fools. <S%H1984><s%>
He looses <S%H6605><s%> the bond <S%H4148><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> and girds <S%H631><s%> their loins <S%H4975><s%> with a girdle. <S%H232><s%>
He leads <S%H3212><s%> princes <S%H3548><s%> away spoiled, <S%H7758><s%> and overthrows <S%H5557><s%> the mighty. <S%H386><s%>
He removes <S%H5493><s%> away the speech <S%H8193><s%> of the trusty, <S%H539><s%> and takes <S%H3947><s%> away the understanding <S%H2940><s%> of the aged. <S%H2205><s%>
He pours <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> on princes, <S%H5081><s%> and weakens <S%H7503><s%> the strength <S%H4206><s%> of the mighty. <S%H650><s%>
He discovers <S%H1540><s%> deep <S%H6013><s%> things out of darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and brings <S%H3318><s%> out to light <S%H216><s%> the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death. <S%H6757><s%>
He increases <S%H7679><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and destroys <S%H6><s%> them: he enlarges <S%H7849><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and straitens <S%H5148><s%> them again.

He takes <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and causes them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in a wilderness <S%H8414><s%> where there is no <S%H3808><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>
They grope <S%H4959><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and he makes them to stagger <S%H8582><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man.
